question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements with respect to the Inga alley cropping practices in several parts of the world?
  1. It helps in nitrogen fixation of soil
  2. It protects soil degradation
  3. It is native to Central and South America
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Inga alley cropping is done by growing Inga trees between crops. Inga trees are native to Central and South America. It grows well on the acid soils of the tropical rainforest and former rainforest. They are leguminous and fix nitrogen into a form usable by plants.
